entry.data:
PARTLY SUNNY WITH A 20 PERCENT CHANCE OF SNOW SHOWERS
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE UPPER 20S
WEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLEAR
COLD WITH LOWS AROUND 13
WEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

SUNNY IN THE MORNING, THEN PARTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF FLURRIES IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 30S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN CLEARING
COLD WITH LOWS AROUND 15
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 10 MPH, BECOMING NORTHWEST WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT

SUNNY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 20S
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS AROUND 10 ABOVE
HIGHS IN THE MID 30S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 20S
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
